edu.xtec.jclic.boxes

Interface Resizable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActiveBoxBag, ActiveBoxGrid, BoxBag, TextGrid

    public interface Resizable
    This interface applies to all the objects that have "bounds" (location, witdh and height) and can be resized or moved.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)
